content: the kilometre scarf is a soft double layered stockinette scarf with no visible wrong side it uses one kilometre of your preferred dk weight yarn to create a piece you ll reach for all winter sizes one size measurements the finished scarf measures approximately 25cm by 180cm you can knit it to your preferred length but if you would like it to be much longer you may end up needing more yarn needles 4 5mm circular needles 100cm and 40cm lengths gauge 20 stitches x 26 row on 4 5mm needles in stockinette yarn approximately 1000m of your preferred dk weight yarn or 1000m each of a fingering weight yarn and silk mohair the sample uses 5 skeins of cashmere from skall studio and 5 skeins of soft silk mohair from knitting for olive notions two stitch markers a needle to weave in ends
